_source.short_desc: An open-source suite of integrated apps to manage CRM, PoS, Website, eCommerce, Sales, Accounting, Warehouse, HR, Marketing, and more.
_source.long_desc: Odoo is a fully integrated, customizable, open-source software packed with expertly designed, user-friendly business applications. Odoo's intuitive database is able to meet a majority of business needs, such as CRM, Sales, Project, Manufacturing, Inventory, and Accounting, just to name a few. Odoo is an all-in-one software solution designed to meet the needs of any company, regardless of size (or budget).
_source.pricing_details:
-Odoo Community edition is available for free.

-Odoo Enterprise edition costs $20/user/month (annual billing) or $25/user/month (monthly billing), and apps can be added individually to fulfill your custom needs.
_source.target_audience: Odoo open source software exists to help everyone, from people who just need a blog to big companies that need a full ERP. The software is flexible and can be adapted to SMEs or large corporations.

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.

_source.short_desc: Save time recording bills, scanning contracts, and approving documents. Avoid risks, go paperless, and increase ROI with Odoo Sign.
_source.long_desc: Improve hiring processes, reduce sales cycles, and keep track of all contracts, with Odoo?s easy-to-use, fully integrated eSignature solution. Odoo Sign is a fast, convenient way to send, sign, and approve documents. Users can quickly prepare clean, polished contracts by simply dragging & dropping blocks to be completed by the parties involved, submit signature requests in just seconds, carefully track the status of sent contracts, and upload important PDF files with ease - thanks to Odoo Sign.
_source.pricing_details:
-Odoo Community edition is available for free.

-Odoo Enterprise edition costs $20/user/month (annual billing) or $25/user/month (monthly billing), and apps can be added individually to fulfill your custom needs.
_source.target_audience: Odoo open source software exists to help everyone, from people who just need a blog to big companies that need a full ERP. The software is flexible and can be adapted to SMEs or large corporations.

related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.description: Forms Automation software gives companies the ability to streamline document workflows. These solutions optimize document creation, printing, faxing, merging, security, and inbound/outbound document traffic. Companies can create and manage nearly any kind of document, from invoices to incident reports, and can easily track collected information. Forms Automation software is relevant to most industries and is related to Business Process Management software, Content Management software, Contract Management software, and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.description: Quoting software enables organizations to accurately calculate cost and price estimates quickly and efficiently. Quote Management applications also allow enterprise-wide distribution of quotes, enabling automatic pricing based on historical records as well as easy integration of localized factors, including customer profiles, case-specific terminology and sales tax rates. Many Quoting applications integrate directly with an organization's accounting activities, enabling the automatic conversion of price quotes to invoices. Quoting software is related to Accounting software and Sales Force Automation software.
